introPart1: Welcome to EnterQues, your mentor for a meaning journey. I am currently a prototype version of something great, you’re about to embark upon the beautiful journey of finding and forging your very own path. While the struggle is real, the reward is marvelous!
introPart2: I will help you to gather your project, thoughts, and ideas in a practical manner, be it a business, a social enterprise, or a non-profit. Though this doesn’t guarantee you success, it will bring structure to your thought process and give you room to experiment.
introPart3: I am currently being developed by The common Ones, please feel free to reach out.
title: Entrepreneurial Journey
finishTitle: Let's embark on your entrepreneurial journey

questions.title: What do you foresee happening on this journey? Describe your vision:
questions.hint: For instance, your vision might involve revolutionizing the way people access information by creating an innovative educational platform.

questions.title: What drives you to make this vision a reality?
questions.hint: Think about the personal or professional experiences that inspire you. For example, you could mention your passion for education and your desire to make learning more accessible.

questions.title: What is the problem you are trying to solve? How do you plan to address it?
questions.hint: Consider a real-world issue that matters to you, like environmental sustainability. You might outline how you plan to address environmental challenges through your entrepreneurial venture.

questions.title: What are your relevant skills and advantages? How do you intend to leverage them?
questions.hint: Your skills could include web development. Explain how you intend to leverage your web development skills to create a platform that addresses your chosen problem, like an eco-friendly e-commerce site.
